org.openhab.core.automation.handler

Interface TriggerHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ModuleHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseTriggerModuleHandler

    @NonNullByDefault
public interface TriggerHandler
extends ModuleHandler
    This Handler interface is used by the RuleManager to set a callback interface to itself. The callback has to implemented TriggerHandlerCallback interface and it is used to notify the RuleManager when TriggerHandler was triggered
    Author:
    Yordan Mihaylov - Initial contribution, Ana Dimova - Initial contribution, Vasil Ilchev - Initial contribution
    See Also:
    ModuleHandler

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.openhab.core.automation.handler.ModuleHandler

        dispose, setCallback
